> Reminder: The canonical Copilot instructions live at `.github/copilot-instructions.md`. If you edited or added guidance elsewhere, migrate it to the canonical file and remove duplicates. **Important**: Copilot MUST NOT perform any repository-changing actions (create branches, commit, push, open PRs or issues, merge, tag, or run destructive git commands) without explicit, itemized confirmation from a human reviewer.
